Position: Pipline Engineer
Responsibilities:
Project Planning, Execution & expediting of the project as per the schedule.
Planning, Execution, Control and Supervision of all activities of Hydro testing.
Coordination with Pipe Line spread in charge, QA/QC and HSE team in the organization and those of 
client for related activities
Manpower, equipment and material planning for cleaning, gauging, Hydro testing, Dewatering, 
Swabbing, Drying and leak
Review hydro test package, carry out inspection of the lines prior to testing Preparation of test pack, 
Planning and execution of preparatory activities.
Checking hydro test equipments and instruments.
Less number of repairs during welding.
Use of specification and procedure for quality welding.
Installation/ Commissioning of the pipeline and supervision of pipeline laying
Material Procurement  as per the Drawing &documents and other bulk items
Co-ordination with sub-contractors and Man Power ManagementGenerating Documents like progress and billing reports on monthly basis.
Preparation of As-Built documents.
Key Skills:

Highly motivated

Good team player
